file_content.text: I've got an anti-materiel rifle trained on your position and an unrestricted firing angle for at least a hundred meters.
That's either really good, or really bad depending on your reasons for being here.
I represent an alliance forming against Emperor Arcann. We thought that might interest you.
I'm from the alliance.
So the message said.
We were told to meet you here. Are we not expected?
No need for violence.
You are.
Easy. We're just here to talk. You're expecting us, right?
No need for violence.
We are.
That's how you greet the people looking to help you?
I don't appreciate the threat.
Under the circumstances-- I'm taking precautions.
They're alone, sir. No sign of transmissions.
That really you, sir?
Aric? It's good to hear your voice.
Glad you're alive, Jorgan.
Likewise.
Your vision not what it used to be?
Can't trust your eyes?
Better than ever if I can see ghosts.
You're late, Jorgan. I want a sitrep.
Get out here.
Respectfully, we aren't late.
Stand down, Havoc.
Don't take it personally. We aren't on the best terms with the Republic right now.
Isn't that right, Theron?
It wasn't all that long ago that I'd have given up my pension to take that shot.
But I guess it's not just the spies making compromises these days.
Don't look at me, I was never here.
Major Jorgan, Havoc Squad.
You're the one who's supposedly killed the Emperor. Twice now.
I've stopped his plans, but I can't claim to have ended the Emperor's life.
That's not the whole truth.
Nor should you want to.
You were the Jedi that exposed the Children of the Emperor.
As you can see, the Emperor's designs spanned farther than we'd dared to fear.
One plot of many.
Given ten lifetimes, could you unravel all that I have wrought? I wonder.
You're the privateer that took down the Voidwolf.
That sounded a lot more impressive before the Eternal Fleet showed up.
For what it's worth.
Even more so to command it.
You were the Emperor's choice murderer.
I am no one's wrath but my own.
Not ever again.
And I have no need of it now.
You were on the Dark Council.
I have my sights set quite higher now.
Only my latest stepping stone.
The audacity of your ambition never ceases to entertain me.
You assassinated the last good Supreme Chancellor the Republic is likely to see.
And the Sith Emperor. Call it square.
I've hit the Empire hard too.
A convenient lie, but I am neither your victim nor your captive.
You used to be at the top of the Republic's most wanted.
You might have that honor now.
I'm not alone.
We knew the consequences. We'll live with them.
You I don't recognize.
You've heard of Cipher Nine.
And now I've got a face to put to all the scary stories.
For as long as I choose to wear it.
Not that that matters.
When you transcend the need for one at all, then you may understand me.
Havoc can claim some impressive accomplishments of their own, from what I hear.
I'm in good company.
We done patting each other's backs?
Having second thoughts about cooperating?
Will that be a problem?
We don't have to like each other to do what needs to be done.
My old life is gone. Stopping Arcann is all that matters now.
That was a long time ago.
We're on the same page then.
I'm tired of seeing Arcann stomp all over the galaxy.
You want to finally start giving as good as you're getting, I've got an op that can use your help.
It's really damn good to see you, sir.
You don't need to salute me anymore, Major.
I'm not your superior.
I'll always salute for you.
Five years, Jorgan. A salute won't cut it.
Forget the formalities.
No. I suppose it won't.
I think I deserve more than a salute.
Forget the formalities.
I thought you were dead....
I'm your wife, not your CO.
Forget the formalities.
I've been a widower five years... it's a lot to take in.
Ahem-- later. Alone, alright?
I want to see what you've been doing with my old command.
Present Havoc for inspection.
Keeping it the best of the best, sir. Form up!
Meet the new Havoc.
I promised you I'd keep Havoc the top squad in the Republic. I meant it.
Meet the new blood.
It's an honor to meet you, Colonel.
Colonel?
Posthumously awarded at your service. Sorry that's what it took.
We're putting together an op to finally start giving to the Zakuulans as good as we've been getting. If you want in, we could use your help.
What do you need?
Your landing didn't go unnoticed.
Hostiles!
[Flirt] Forget the formalities.
[Flirt] Forget the formalities.
